title: Sundance Holdings Group Bans Angora Wool (PETA - People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals) ...
text: ( Source : PETA - People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals ) Local Retailer Drops Items Made With Rabbits ' Fur Following Talks With PETA For Immediate Release : October 5 , 2015 Contact : Sophia Charchuk 202-483-7382 Salt Lake City - Retailer
